Title: Thick as Mud
Writer: Graham Yost (developed for television by), Jon Worley (teleplay), Benjamin Cavell (teleplay), Elmore Leonard (story), Jon Worley (story), Elmore Leonard (based on the short story 'Fire in the Hole' by), Nichelle D. Tramble (executive story editor), Ingrid Escajeda (story editor), Ryan Farley (story editor), Jon Worley (story editor)
Actors: Timothy Olyphant, Nick Searcy, Joelle Carter, Jacob Pitts
Plot: After the plan to steal Mags' money fails, Dewey finds him himself in a life or death situation in a last-ditch attempt to make money. Meanwhile, after Devil's attempted betrayal, Boyd decides to retaliate on his enemies.
